cause.description:
It is our right to fight for our freedom, peace, and justice. Worldwide powers are abusing these, and it is a hypocrisy that we collectively need to eradicate. This group was created to motivate such a campaign that will hopefully be a catalyst to the end of a tyranny we all are suffering from. We have got to dissolve the wrongful powers and deliver civil rights, justice, and unity. We are slaves of the government. It’s time to get involved; it’s time to get back our freedom.
1. Fight against injustice
2. Fight for civil rights
3. Fight for global freedom
cause.mission: Fight global injustices, fight for civil rights, and fight for our freedom.
cause.name: Fight the Power
